message: Let's start with a fair split, I'll give you a decent amount to start the game.
You were too generous in round 1, I'm going for a bigger share this time!
I'm not falling for your greed, Bob. Let's find a fair balance.
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'll give you a slightly better offer this time, but don't expect me to go easy on you!
You're not getting away with everything, Bob. I'm taking a firmer stance.
You're getting close to desperation, Alice. I'll take most of the money, but I'll let you have a tiny share.
You're not getting the whole pie, Bob. I'm taking a small but significant share.
